story_30_01000/2401_1001_0100_10:
All right! Looking great, team! Any last-minute
adjustments to make before we take off?
story_30_01000/2401_1001_0200_10:
If not, we should probably head to the arena soon.
We can’t show up late to the finals!
story_30_01000/2401_1001_0600_10: I challenge you to a battle! Right here, right now!
story_30_01000/2401_1001_0700_10:
B-Blue! What are you doing? We don’t have time
for that right now!
story_30_01000/2401_1001_0800_10:
Besides, if your Pokémon get hurt, they won’t be
able to give one hundred percent in our battle
with [Name:PlayerNickname ]’s team!
story_30_01000/2401_1001_1100_10:
The three of us are supposed to be a team
right now.
story_30_01000/2401_1001_1300_10:
Yeah, I know we’re a team. And maybe I’m just
being selfish.
story_30_01000/2401_1001_1500_10:
I’m not even sure why I joined this team in the
first place...
story_30_01000/2401_1001_1700_10:
Leaf, when you first approached us and we
started this team together...
story_30_01000/2401_1001_1800_10:
It wasn’t BAD, per se... Fighting on a team
with you two was even kinda fun.
story_30_01000/2401_1001_1900_10:
But when we started facing tougher opponents,
I felt myself starting to rely on you, Red.
And then it hit me...
story_30_01000/2401_1001_2000_10:
Why should I get pushed to the side while you get
the spotlight?
story_30_01000/2401_1001_2100_10: I’m not your right-hand man—I’m your rival!
story_30_01000/2401_1001_2400_10: Lemme guess... Nothing to say, Red?
story_30_01000/2401_1001_2500_10:
Look at me, getting all worked up while you stand
there all cool...
story_30_01000/2401_1001_2600_10:
Whatever, it’s fine. Now’s not the time. Just
forget I said anything, all right?
story_30_01000/2401_1001_2700_10: C’mon, let’s go! We’re gonna be late!
story_30_01000/2401_1001_3500_10: Are you really that surprised? You guys are rivals.
story_30_01000/2401_1001_3600_10: Of course he wants to battle you, too!
story_30_01000/2401_1001_3800_10:
Even so...I’m still really glad the three of us
formed this team together.
story_30_01000/2401_1001_3900_10:
We all grew up in Pallet Town, got our first
Pokémon from Professor Oak, started our
journeys together...
story_30_01000/2401_1001_4000_10:
And even though we all took different paths after
that, we eventually found each other again here
on Pasio.
story_30_01000/2401_1001_4100_10:
It’s like that old sign near your house, Red...
“Shades of your journey await!”
story_30_01000/2401_1001_4200_10:
Teaming up here felt like starting a new journey—
like a blank palette. And I’m glad we got to
discover new colors together again.
story_30_01000/2401_1001_4500_10: Heh! What are you talkin’ about?
story_30_01000/2401_1001_4600_10:
I think you need to get your ears cleaned or
something, Leaf.
story_30_01000/2401_1001_4700_10:
Didn’t I just say that battling with you two
actually ain’t half bad?
story_30_01000/2401_1001_4800_10: Oh, just admit that you like it already!
story_30_01000/2401_1001_4900_10: Heh! All right, all right. I know now’s not the time.
story_30_01000/2401_1001_5000_10:
Red! I’m gonna have to give you a rain check on
our big showdown!
story_30_01000/2401_1001_5100_10:
Right now, our only focus should be beating
[Name:PlayerNickname ]’s team at the finals!
story_30_01000/2401_1001_5200_10:
C’mon, team! Let’s give this thing everything we’ve
got—and win, obviously!
